We are constantly improving our Toggle app for better performance, stability and usability. This update includes fixes related to the IOS 13.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-  Updated FAQ page
-  Fixed app crash encountered when playing downloaded content on offline mode
-  Bug fixes and performance improvements

From 30 Jan, we have renamed Toggle to meWATCH as part of Mediacorp's branding efforts to design more personalised made for you experiences. 

Sign in with the new single sign-on platform, meCONNECT where you can access personalisation options and enhance your experience across any of Mediacorp's digital services.

Discover our programmes with our new menu options. Search for content by Series, Language and Genre.
We are currently improving our meWATCH app for better performance, stability and usability. This update includes bug fixes related to content download.

Optimisation on iPhone and iPad:
- Fixed movie posters display bug
- Fixed search result loading bug
 
Optimisation on iPad:
- Fixed content loading bug
- Fixed auto-play to next episode experience
- Enabled auto-hide of "Home indicator" on video player
